text: @realDonaldTrump My mother is a healthy 95-year-old! She's not ready to DIE & I'm not ready to lose her! Every day that goes by that you spread disinformation, LIES, & downplay #COVID19 so you can stroke your own ego is another day that she has to live in fear! If you can't tell the truth, STFU!
